title: Setting - Sci-fi
contents: property | Unique: | Choose a single world setting for each story.

text | A. Connection of planets linked by series of gates: The Star Chain. Techno-religion provides a sense of purpose and driving force for expansion of chain, towards a higher understanding. [+Revere the ancient/archaeological, +Techno-Knights, +Charitable to the poor/old/sick, –Violent expansion]

text | B. Mini-galaxy residing inside a planet. Light-beings work to restore the outer, desolate world, destroyed by 4th-dimensional beings. [+Bodyswappers, +Tenacious, +Female-dominant, –Hydrophobic, –Powerful but small]

title: Setting - Sci-fi
contents: property | Unique: | Choose a single world setting for each story.

text | A. 21st Century world on the cusp of curing all disease except infertility, incidences of which have increased. [+Communist society, +Green energy, –Zero immigration, –Genetic engineering terrorism]

text | B. Transcendent world: huge atmosphere, small landmass. Beings (human or otherwise) can fly and phase through objects. Live in massive connected anti-grav blimps in sky. [+Sexless, +Barter society, –Pacifist, –Vulnerable to darker emotions (hatred)]

title: Setting - Sci-fi
contents: property | Unique: | Choose a single world setting option for each story.

text | A. Machine-based world where humans have evolved into unfeeling cyborgs; technology is used as a crutch to solve every societal issue. [+Disease-less, +Control over subconscious, +No need for sleep, –Emotion-less, –Underground]

text | B. Dark empire with psionic/mental gravitational powers that push worlds into their central system's sun to feed it's energy.[+Great wealth, +Culture unifier, –Near-deathless, –Anti-humanoid, –Totalitarian]
